analysis: The documents are all related to expressions of respect and mourning. The first document is an announcement of the death of Elihu B. Washburne and the closure of the State Department in his honor. The second document orders the flag to be flown at half-staff in memory of Ambassador Rodger P. Davies. The third document announces the closure of government departments in remembrance of those who fell in defense of the nation.
title: Governmental Expressions of Mourning and Remembrance
